wikipedia_page.main: Iain Cameron Conn (born 22 October 1962) is a British businessman. He was the  chief executive (CEO) of Centrica from 2015 to 2019.

response: *Iain Conn, an executive director of the BP Group.
Iain Conn was appointed Group Chief Executive of Centrica on 1 January 2015; he had previously been BP's chief executive, downstream (BP's refining and marketing division) for seven years.

link_mentions.page: List of people associated with the University of London
response: * Iain Conn – Group Managing Director of BP (ICL)
* Iain Conn, Chief Executive, Refining and Marketing, British Petroleum

link_mentions.page: Department of Chemical Engineering, Imperial College London
response: * Iain Conn  – A graduate from the department, he is currently the CEO of Centrica and former Group Executive Office of BP from 2004 to 2014.
